633980.name: Two Worlds II - CoT Soundtrack
633980.description:
Enjoy Antaloor apart from visuals: with the Two Worlds II: Call of the Tenebrae Soundtrack! The epic, atmospherically toned music will be a feast for your ears.

PLAYLIST

  • 01. Main theme - [03:47]
  • 02. Weapons on fire - [01:47]
  • 03. Heroes heart - [02:01]
  • 04. Till the end - [02:05]
  • 05. Clouds of Antaloor - [03:37]
  • 06. We will meet again - [02:40]
  • 07. Return to Dorchad - [02:35]
  • 08. We stay strong - [02:58]
  • 09. Chants of stone - [01:11]
  • 10. Monastery Tenebrae - [02:16]
  • 11. Secret unveiled - [02:09]

Soundtrack composed and mixed by Goran Bastinac.
633980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
